channel.title: Help with adding working pking
channel.description: hey im using vistascape 508 source and it was a perfect source untill i went to wildy with my friend and realised we couldnt attack each other it was very frustrating and i've tried like 4 other source's since then none of them i like though, i was just wondering does anyone know how to make it so you can attack each other in wild?

item.title: Help with adding working pking
item.dc:creator: @ima_rare ima rare
item.description:
@ima_rare wrote:

hey im using vistascape 508 source and it was a perfect source untill i went to wildy with my friend and realised we couldnt attack each other it was very frustrating and i’ve tried like 4 other source’s since then none of them i like though, i was just wondering does anyone know how to make it so you can attack each other in wild?
